snippet.title: Anno 1800 Console - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Close the door. And deep within. Anno 1800 is coming to next-gen consoles on 16th March.

All roads lead to home.

About Anno 1800™:
Welcome to the dawn of the Industrial Age. 

Experience one of the most exciting and fast-changing periods of all time in a rich city-building experience.

Discover new technologies, continents and societies. The strategy you choose will define your world.

Play solo, PvP or co-op. How the world remembers your name is up to you.
PRE-ORDER TO GET ACCESS TO THE EARLY ADOPTER OFFER: https://www.annogame.com/console

FOLLOW US ON: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/annogame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ANNO_EN
Website: https://www.annogame.com/console
#Anno1800 #Ubisoft

About Ubisoft:
Ubisoft is a creator of worlds, committed to enriching players’ lives with original and memorable entertainment experiences. Ubisoft’s global teams create and develop a deep and diverse portfolio of games, featuring brands such as Assassin’s Creed®, Brawlhalla®, For Honor®, Far Cry®, Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon®, Just Dance®, Rabbids®, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six®, The Crew®, Tom Clancy’s The Division®, and Watch Dogs®. Through Ubisoft Connect, players can enjoy an ecosystem of services to enhance their gaming experience, get rewards and connect with friends across platforms. With Ubisoft+, the subscription service, they can access a growing catalogue of more than 100 Ubisoft games and DLC. For the 2021–22 fiscal year, Ubisoft generated net bookings of €2,129 million. To learn more, please visit: www.ubisoftgroup.com.

© 2023 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Anno 1800, Ubisoft and the Ubisoft logo are registered or unregistered trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries. Anno is a registered or unregistered trademarks of Ubisoft GmbH in the US and/or other countries. Developed and published by Ubisoft.
